abstract: DealBook Online; Telecom Italia announces plan to sell up to 40 percent of Infrastrutture Wireless Italiane, its wireless telecommunications tower unit, in initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: The company said it planned to seek a listing for the unit, Infrastrutture Wireless Italiane, on the Borsa Italiana in Milan.

headline.main: Telecom Italia Plans I.P.O. of Wireless Tower Unit

snippet: The company said it planned to seek a listing for the unit, Infrastrutture Wireless Italiane, on the Borsa Italiana in Milan.
